definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="5"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">About LLamaMod -- version </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">1.0.0-beta6</field></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> made for Minecraft 1.21.8 w/ Neoforge </field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">-- LlamaMod is developed by Omegabird113 w/ MCreator version </field></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">2025.3, plus the Blockstates plugin.</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s  ["",{"text":"To view LlamaMod's source code, visit:"},{"text":" ","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://github.com/Omegabird113/llamamod/"}},{"text":"https://github.com/Omegabird113/llamamod/","underlined":true,"color":"green","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://github.com/Omegabird113/llamamod/"}}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
